note:
#introduction Hello all, newbie here.
Retired electronic tech but had many other jobs.
USMC vet though served only 2.5 years due to accident/med discharge.
Have become somewhat of a recluse since retiring but was gifted with an eskipoo puppy 4yrs ago and he keeps me busy.
Got kicked off twitter soon after musk took over, didn't say why but I am a leftist so maybe that was it. My handle was meetnpatatas.
Hope to get to know a lot of you as I get better on this platform.
